@Dezminator
To seed, just don't touch the torrent, even after it hits 100%. After it downloads, it's status willgo from Downloading to Seeding. Just leave the torrent running for a while. At least reach a ratio of 1.000, to show some respect for the uploader. (No worries, im a noob at this too. Lol.)
